---
title: "Working Groups"
---

To advance FishMIP 2.0, we are in the process of establishing several Working Group Projects with specific objectives:

1) Improve Reliability of Our Model Ensembles

2) Promote Climate-Resilient Food Security

3) Protect Ecosystems & Biodiversity

4) Test Climate Solutions


If you are interested in finding out more please contact us: fishmip.coordinators@googlemail.com
